[Data]
    AutoPartition = 1
    MsDosInitiated = 1
    UnattendedInstall = Yes

[Unattended]
    UnattendMode = FullUnattended
    DriverSigningPolicy = Ignore
    ExtendOemPartition = 1
    OemSkipEula = Yes
    OemPreinstall = No
    TargetPath = \WINNT
    UnattendSwitch = Yes
    FileSystem = convertNTFS
    UseWholeDisk = Yes
    Repartition = No

[GuiUnattended]
    AutoLogon = Yes
    OEMSkipRegional = 1
    OemSkipWelcome = 1

[Networking]
    InstallDefaultComponents = No

[NetAdapters]
    Adapter1 = params.Adapter1

[params.Adapter1]
    INFID = *

[NetClients]
    MS_MSClient = params.MS_MSClient

[NetServices]
    MS_SERVER = params.MS_SERVER

[NetProtocols]
    MS_TCPIP = params.MS_TCPIP

[params.MS_TCPIP]
    EnableLMHosts = Yes
    AdapterSections = params.MS_TCPIP.Adapter1

[params.MS_TCPIP.Adapter1]
    SpecificTo = Adapter1
    DHCP = Yes
